title: Vivo Y29 5G launched in India with Military Grade durability: All you need to know - India TV News
summary:
Vivo Y29 5G launched in India with Military Grade durability: All you need to know

Publication Date: December 26, 2024 | Source: India TV News

Vivo has unveiled the Vivo Y29 5G in India, a mid-range smartphone priced from Rs 13,999. It features military-grade durability with an IP64 rating for dust and splash resistance.

  • 6.68-inch LCD with 120Hz refresh rate and up to 1000 nits brightness.
  • 50MP AI Night Mode rear camera and 8MP front camera.
  • Powered by MediaTek Dimensity 6300 processor and a 5500mAh battery.
  • Running on Funtouch OS 14 based on Android 14.
  • Available in four storage variants with prices starting at Rs 13,999.
“Vivo claims the battery retains 80% capacity over four years of usage.”

The Vivo Y29 5G offers robust features at an affordable price, making it a competitive option in the mid-range smartphone market.
newTitle: Vivo Y29 5G launched in India with Military Grade durability: All you need to know

title: Tourist boat capsizes off Calangute beach in North Goa; 1 killed - The Times of India
summary:
Tourist Boat Capsizes Off Calangute Beach in North Goa; 1 Killed

Publication Date: October 16, 2023 | Source: Times of India

A tragic incident occurred off the coast of Calangute beach in North Goa, where a tourist boat capsized, resulting in one death. The authorities have initiated investigations and search operations for any missing individuals.

  • The boat capsized under unclear circumstances, with immediate rescue operations launched.
  • Local police and coast guard personnel were involved in the search efforts.
  • The deceased has been identified as a tourist.
"We are doing everything possible to recover those unaccounted for and ensure such incidents do not occur again." - Local Official

This unfortunate event highlights the ongoing concerns regarding safety regulations and the management of tourist activities in coastal areas.
newTitle: Tourist Boat Capsizes Near Calangute Beach, Goa; One Fatality Reported

title: N Srinivasan resigns as CEO, MD of India Cements after CCI approves ₹7,000-crore UltraTech deal - Mint
summary:
N Srinivasan resigns as CEO, MD of India Cements after CCI approves ₹7,000-crore UltraTech deal

Publication Date: December 25, 2024

Source: Live Mint

N Srinivasan has resigned from his position as CEO and MD of India Cements following UltraTech Cement's acquisition of a 32 percent stake in the company, resulting in its classification as a subsidiary.

  • N Srinivasan and several board members stepped down after the acquisition.
  • The Competition Commission of India approved UltraTech's ₹7,000-crore deal for significant ownership of India Cements.
  • UltraTech now holds approximately 55.49% of India Cements' equity share capital.
  • New directors have been appointed to the board post-resignation.
“UltraTech has acquired sole control of the company and has become the promoter.”

This acquisition marks a significant shift in the Indian cement industry, where consolidation and competition between major corporate groups are intensifying.
newTitle: N Srinivasan Resigns as CEO of India Cements Following UltraTech Acquisition

Baby John Opening Day Box Office Trends: Varun Dhawan starrer aims at a Rs 12 crore start - PINKVILLA
summary:
Baby John Opening Day Box Office Trends: Varun Dhawan starrer aims at a Rs 12 crore start

Published on Dec 25, 2024 | Source: Pinkvilla

The Varun Dhawan led action entertainer, Baby John, has taken a promising start at the Indian box office, with early trends indicating a first-day business of Rs 11 crore to Rs 12 crore.

  • The film's performance benefited from the Christmas holiday but faced competition from other releases like Pushpa 2 and Mufasa.
  • It is suggested that without competition, Baby John could have opened in the range of Rs 13 crore to Rs 15 crore.
  • Despite the challenges, this is the best opening for Varun Dhawan among recent non-franchise films, barring 83 directed by Kabir Khan.
  • The holiday period ahead offers opportunities for Baby John to potentially achieve Rs 100 crore by the end of its run.
  • The first day's drop and subsequent hold in business on Day 2 and Day 3 will be crucial in determining its long-term trajectory.
“It’s a decent start for Baby John, but the trend over the next few days is crucial.”

In conclusion, while Baby John shows promise, its success will depend on audience turnout in the coming days amid ongoing competition.
newTitle: Baby John Aims for a Rs 12 Crore Opening Day at the Box Office

summary:
Parkinson’s Patients Exhibit Preference for Mayonnaise and Olive Oil

This article explores a surprising culinary preference among Parkinson's disease patients for mayonnaise and olive oil.

  • Research reveals that Parkinson's patients may have specific taste preferences influenced by their condition.
  • The study suggests that these preferences could be linked to the effects of Parkinson's on taste sensation and olfaction.
  • Understanding these preferences could lead to better dietary recommendations for patients.
“The unexpected tastes observed in patients could indicate underlying neurological processes at play.”

This study underscores the importance of considering dietary preferences in managing health for individuals with Parkinson’s disease.

title: MEGA EXCLUSIVE: Kartik Aaryan and Karan Johar join hands for Rs. 150 crore action love story; Sameer Vidhwans to direct - Bollywood Hungama
summary:
Kartik Aaryan and Karan Johar Collaborate on Ambitious Rs. 150 Crore Action Love Story

Publication Date: December 2024 Source: Bollywood Hungama

Kartik Aaryan and Karan Johar are set to collaborate on their first film together, an action-packed love story directed by Sameer Vidhwans, known for Satyaprem Ki Katha.

  • The project has been in discussion for a long time and is now officially in place.
  • The film has a budget of Rs. 150 crores and is described as one of the most ambitious love stories of modern times.
  • Kartik Aaryan is enthusiastic about returning to the big screen after his role in Bhool Bhulaiyaa 3.
  • The film will be co-produced by Dharma Productions and Namah Pictures, with an announcement expected within two days.
"It's an ambitious film to be made on a budget of Rs. 150 crores, and the entire team is very excited to bring the film to the audience in 2026."

This collaboration could have significant implications for both Aaryan's and Johar's careers, merging their fanbases and setting high expectations for the film's success.
newTitle: Kartik Aaryan and Karan Johar Collaborate on Ambitious Rs. 150 Crore Action Love Story

title: Mpox: Belgium Detects First Case Of Clade 1b Strain; WHO Tags It As 'Especially Concerning' - TheHealthSite
summary:
Mpox: Belgium Detects First Case Of Clade 1b Strain; WHO Tags It As 'Especially Concerning'

Publication Date: Not specified   Source: The Health Site

Mpox continues to be a global concern with Belgium reporting its first case of the Clade 1b strain, marking it as the eighth non-African country to do so. The WHO has noted the rapid spread linked to sexual contact.

  • Belgium reports first case of Clade 1b strain of mpox.
  • The strain is spreading faster through sexual contact, not animal to human transmission.
  • Other detected countries include Canada, Germany, Sweden, Thailand, the UK, and the US.
  • Initially emerged in the DRC, now spreading among young adults and potentially children.
“It is spreading among young adults via close physical contact, often sexual contact,” WHO stated.

While mpox can be transmitted from animals, recent outbreaks suggest human-to-human contact is a major factor in its spread, particularly through sexual activities.
newTitle: Mpox: Belgium Detects First Case Of Clade 1b Strain; WHO Tags It As 'Especially Concerning'

title: Rohit Sharma Replaces KL Rahul; Shubman Gill OUT: India Likely Playing XI For Boxing Day Test - Times Now
summary:
Rohit Sharma Replaces KL Rahul; Shubman Gill OUT: India Likely Playing XI For Boxing Day Test

Publication Date: N/A Source: Times Now

India are currently level 1-1 in the Border-Gavaskar Trophy and seek to take a lead in the series during the Boxing Day Test at the MCG. Changes in the lineup are expected to improve their chances for World Test Championship qualification.

  • Rohit Sharma returns to open the batting, replacing KL Rahul.
  • Shubman Gill dropped; Dhruv Jurel slated to bat at no.6.
  • Washington Sundar replaces Nitish Kumar Reddy in the all-rounder slot.
  • Virat Kohli and Rishabh Pant remain at positions 4 and 5.
  • India's likely playing XI: Rohit Sharma (c), Yashasvi Jaiswal, KL Rahul, Virat Kohli, Rishabh Pant (wk), Dhruv Jurel, Ravindra Jadeja, Washington Sundar, Akash Deep, Jasprit Bumrah, Mohammed Siraj.

The bank behind the fintech revolution stumbles after customer funds go missing | Company Business News - Mint
summary:
Crisis at Evolve Bank After Customer Funds Go Missing

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Company Business News

Scot Lenoir has led Evolve Bank from a regional institution to a prominent player in Silicon Valley, but it now faces a crisis as customers can't access their funds, prompting withdrawals after a business partner failure.

  • Evolve Bank managed around $10 billion for fintech firms like Stripe and Affirm.
  • It provides banks to fintechs that need a partner to handle customer funds.
  • A significant number of customers are affected by the recent issues with accessing their money.
“Evolve Bank turned a sleepy farming bank into one of Silicon Valley’s top financial partners.”

This incident highlights the vulnerabilities in the fintech banking model as user trust is undermined.
newTitle: Crisis at Evolve Bank After Customer Funds Go Missing

title: Pakistan's schedule for ICC Champions Trophy 2025, Men in Green to take on India on... - India.com
summary:
Pakistan's ICC Champions Trophy 2025 Schedule: Key Matches Against India

Publication Date: Not specified Source: India.com

Pakistan's national cricket team is set for an exciting schedule in the ICC Champions Trophy 2025, highlighted by a highly anticipated match against India.

  • Pakistan's opening game will be against New Zealand on February 19 in Karachi.
  • The much-awaited match against India will be on February 23 in Dubai.
  • Pakistan's last group game will be against Bangladesh on February 27 in Rawalpindi.
  • This tournament marks the first time Pakistan will host the event in nearly three decades.
  • Pakistan heads into the tournament as the defending champions, having won the title in 2017 against India.

"Heading into the tournament as the current victors from their 2017 title win over India, Pakistan is all set to show its prowess once again."

The ICC Champions Trophy 2025 is generating excitement among cricket fans worldwide, and Pakistan's performance will be closely watched as they strive to defend their title.
newTitle: Pakistan's ICC Champions Trophy 2025 Schedule: Key Matches Against India

title: Amid PM Modi outreach to Church, a look at Sangh Parivar’s fraught ties with Christians - The Indian Express
summary:
PM Modi's Outreach to Christian Community Amid Tensions with Sangh Parivar

Publication Date: Not specified | Source: Indian Express

Prime Minister Narendra Modi's recent address to the Catholic Bishops’ Conference of India marks a significant outreach towards the Christian community, as he condemns past attacks and aligns his slogans with Christian teachings. This move is part of a broader strategy by the BJP to engage with states having substantial Christian populations.

  • Modi addressed the CBCI at a Christmas celebration, marking it as a historic outreach.
  • He condemned the Christmas market attack in Germany and the Easter bombings in Sri Lanka.
  • Modi aligned his slogan “Sabka Saath, Sabka Vikas” with the values of mercy and service depicted in the Bible.
  • Despite this outreach, tensions between the Sangh Parivar and Christians persist, especially around conversion issues.
  • The BJP aims to strengthen its position in states with significant Christian populations, notably the North-east and Goa.
“The Bible says, carry each other’s burdens. Jesus Christ has shown the world the example of mercy and unconditional service.” - PM Narendra Modi

Modi's outreach is seen as a strategic move to build connections with the Christian community amidst historical tensions driven by the RSS's stance on conversions.
newTitle: PM Modi's Outreach to Christian Community Amid Tensions with Sangh Parivar

The Boxing Day Test between India and Australia begins on December 26 at the Melbourne Cricket Ground with weather forecasts suggesting generally clear conditions, though some rain is expected on the third and fourth days.

  • The series is currently tied at 1-1 after three Tests.
  • India is expected to make strategic changes to their lineup, introducing new players while adjusting batting order.
  • Australia has also confirmed their playing XI with two changes due to injuries.
  • There is a 25% chance of rain on Days 3 and 4, while the overall weather remains hot and humid.
“The 19-year-old Konstas will become Australia's youngest Test debutant since Cummins took the field against South Africa at Johannesburg in 2011.”

title: OnePlus Nord Buds 3 review: ANC meets bass on budget - IBTimes India
summary:
OnePlus Nord Buds 3 review: ANC meets bass on budget

Publication Date: September 17

Source: International Business Times

The OnePlus Nord Buds 3, launched on September 17, have made a significant mark in the budget TWS market by offering good performance for casual users who prioritize battery life and comfort over high-end audio quality.

  • Minimalist design with IP55 rating for water and dust resistance.
  • Lightweight at just 4.4 grams per earbud, ensuring comfort during extended use.
  • Powered by 12.4mm titanium-coated drivers for balanced audio with punchy bass.
  • Effective Active Noise Cancellation (ANC) for blocking low-frequency noise.
  • Impressive battery life offering 7 hours on a single charge and 36 hours with the case.
  • Fast charging capability providing 5 hours of playback with just 10 minutes of charge.
“For those willing to spend more, the Nord Buds 3 Pro offers an upgraded experience at ₹3,299.”

In conclusion, the OnePlus Nord Buds 3 presents a compelling option for budget-conscious consumers, balancing features and affordability, although it has some limitations like the absence of multipoint connectivity and high-resolution audio codecs.
newTitle: OnePlus Nord Buds 3 Review: Affordable ANC with Impressive Bass

title: Allu Arjun, Pushpa 2 makers announce ₹2 crore aid to Sandhya Theatre stampede victim's family - Hindustan Times
summary:
Allu Arjun, Pushpa 2 makers announce ₹2 crore aid to Sandhya Theatre stampede victim's family

Date: Dec 25, 2024 | Source: Hindustan Times

This article discusses the financial support announced by Allu Aravind and others for the family of an eight-year-old boy injured in the tragic Sandhya Theatre stampede that occurred during a screening of Pushpa 2.

  • Allu Aravind announced ₹2 crores to support the family of the injured boy.
  • The boy's mother was killed in the stampede, which happened on December 4.
  • Allu Arjun is currently facing investigation regarding his involvement in the incident.
  • The boy is recovering and has been taken off ventilator support, according to his father.
“The boy, Sri Teja, is recovering. Now he is not on a ventilator. To support the family, we should support him with ₹2 crore.” - Allu Aravind

Despite the ongoing investigation, the support from the film industry highlights the community's response to a tragic incident, focusing on aiding the affected family during a difficult time.
newTitle: Allu Arjun, Pushpa 2 makers announce ₹2 crore aid to Sandhya Theatre stampede victim's family

title: Homemade Ginger Cough Drops In 10 Mins - You Just Need 2 Ingredients - NDTV Food
Modi lays foundation stone of Ken-Betwa river linking project; hails Ambedkar's vision - The Hindu
summary:
PM Modi Launches Ken-Betwa River Linking Project, Highlights Ambedkar's Contribution

Date: December 25, 2024 | Source: The Hindu

Prime Minister Narendra Modi laid the foundation stone for the Ken-Betwa river linking project in Madhya Pradesh, emphasizing the importance of water resource management and criticizing Congress for neglecting Dr. B.R. Ambedkar's contributions.

  • The project aims to provide drinking water to approximately 65 lakh people in Madhya Pradesh and Uttar Pradesh.
  • It will benefit nearly 7.18 lakh agricultural families across 2,000 villages.
  • The project will involve a total cost of ₹44,605 crore.
  • PM Modi inaugurated the Omkareshwar Floating Solar Project and laid the foundation for the Daudhan Irrigation Project during the ceremony.
“The major challenge of the 21st century is water security. In the 21st century only those countries who have adequate water resources with proper management will move forward,” said PM Modi.

The Ken-Betwa project is expected to enhance prosperity in the Bundelkhand region while advancing significant developments in water management.
newTitle: PM Modi Launches Ken-Betwa River Linking Project, Highlights Ambedkar's Contribution

Uttarakhand: Bus falls into 100-metre ditch in Bhimtal; 4 dead, 21 injured - Hindustan Times
summary:
Uttarakhand Bus Accident Leaves 4 Dead and 21 Injured

Date: Dec 25, 2024
Source: Hindustan Times

A roadways bus in Uttarakhand plunged into a 100-meter gorge, resulting in four fatalities and 21 injuries. The vehicle was en route from Bhimtal to Haldwani when the driver lost control.

  • The bus was carrying 20-25 passengers.
  • The tragedy occurred in Bhimtal, Nainital district.
  • Rescue operations were assisted by local residents and State Disaster Relief Force (SDRF) personnel.
  • Chief Minister Pushkar Singh Dhami expressed his condolences on social media.
  • This accident follows another incident in Jammu and Kashmir where five soldiers lost their lives.
“The news of the death of 4 people in the unfortunate bus accident near Bhimtal is extremely heart-rending...” - Pushkar Singh Dhami

This accident underscores the importance of road safety and the need for improved measures to prevent such tragedies in the future.
newTitle: Uttarakhand Bus Accident Leaves 4 Dead and 21 Injured

Jasprit Bumrah achieves historic ICC Rankings feat, equals all time Indian record - The Times of India
summary:
Jasprit Bumrah Achieves Historic ICC Rankings Feat, Matches All-Time Indian Record

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Times of India

Jasprit Bumrah, India’s leading fast bowler, has reached an impressive milestone in the ICC Men's Test Bowling Rankings with 904 rating points, equaling the highest rating ever achieved by an Indian bowler.

  • Bumrah's performance in Brisbane contributed to his elevation in the rankings, as he took 9 wickets for 94 runs, earning 14 rating points.
  • The record previously held by Ravichandran Ashwin has now been matched, and Bumrah has a chance to surpass it in the upcoming Melbourne Test.
  • Travis Head has moved closer to the top three in the ICC Men's Test Batting Rankings following recent outstanding performances.
  • Notable changes in men's rankings have occurred stemming from various matches across formats.
  • Other players like Kagiso Rabada, Josh Hazlewood, and Pat Cummins have also seen significant movements in their rankings.
“Jasprit Bumrah's outstanding performance has solidified his top position in the Test Bowling Rankings.”

The ongoing Test series is witnessing remarkable individual performances, significantly influencing player rankings across international cricket.
newTitle: Jasprit Bumrah Achieves Historic ICC Rankings Feat, Matches All-Time Indian Record
